nodes.text: Chibbier was a forest planet in the Outer Rim Territories. A number of workers were employed to cut down trees on Chibbier, including the human Delta Jeet and her cousins.

Eventually, the forests ran out, and all the workers were laid off. Jeet moved to the planet Batuu, where she worked as a pilot for Ohnaka Transport Solutions. Around 34 ABY, two months after leaving Chibbier, Jeet related her time working there to the smuggler Izal Garsea, who she had been manipulated into taking prisoner by Garsea's former associate Ana Tolla. The planet was labeled on a map in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by the historian Eloc Throno.
Chibbier was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
